section.name: News and Status
section.p: This document contains the latest news and status regarding the Jadabs project. It is here you'll find announcements related to Jadabs.

subsection.name: Current Release 0.6.7
subsection.p:
We are currently working on Jadabs 0.6.x. Basically on bugfix releases and testing code for next major release. For more detailed information and patches see the
changes-report.

subsection.name: 08 April 2004 - Jadabs 0.6.0 released!
subsection.p: With this new release we moved to the OSGi standard. The Jadabs-core is superseded by the OSGi-API and Knopfelfish implementation. All further development will take usage of the OSGi-API. The messaging-layer and the eventsystem have been transformed onto the new API.
